experiences.company: The Bank of New York Mellon
experiences.title: Vice President - Cyber Security
responsibilities: Managed software development for Cyber Security Solutions for both internal and external consumers.
Designed and developed commercial-grade enterprise cybersecurity products (with pending IPs).
Provided monthly reports to C-Suite and stakeholders.
80% hands-on, 20% management. Managed a team of 2 senior developers.
accomplishments: Secured over 80,000 Windows, 10,000 Modern Published Desktops (Windows Servers), and 10,000 MacBooks, covering 99% of all employee devices.
Reduced unauthorized access to company data and services by 97% through implementation that permits only vetted users to access restricted services.
projects: DevOps Administrator: Ensured compliance with BNY corporate policies.
Developed and maintained GitLab CI/CD pipeline, integrated Sonarqube and Artifactory.

Guided and deployed microservices architecture for Web API, ServiceNow workflow integration, Chrome browser extension for browser activity monitoring, and typosquatting prevention feature using ML and .NET Windows services.

experiences.title: Consultant
responsibilities: Developed a Front End React Application connecting to SQL Server and Oracle using Entity Framework.

Implemented custom search functionality using expressions.
accomplishments: Completed the project in 2 months with deployment to 6,000 machines (80% of total machines).

accomplishments: Completed the project in 4 months with deployment to 15,000 machines (70% of total machines).
